list_definition.definition: a great number of fish swimming together in one place

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The fishing boats were searching for large shoals of tuna.

list_definition.definition: a shallow place in the sea etc; a sandbank

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The boat grounded on a shoal.
